# generated by cmake-generator
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16.3)

add_library(clog STATIC
  posix/clog.c
  posix/console.c)

include(Tornado.cmake)
set_tornado(clog)

if(TORNADO_OS_MACOS OR TORNADO_OS_LINUX)
target_compile_definitions(clog PRIVATE _POSIX_C_SOURCE=200112L)
endif()

if(CONFIGURATION_DEBUG)
target_compile_definitions(clog PUBLIC CLOG_LOG_ENABLED)
endif()

target_include_directories(clog PUBLIC ../include)

target_link_libraries(clog
  PUBLIC tiny-libc)
